tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Patrick Swayze /Dirty Dancing - The Time of My Life/
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Dirty Dancing - The last scene: The Time of My Life - Patrick Swayze & Jennifer Gray

tva:Genre.tva:Name: FICTION/DRAMA
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Programme consisting of a prose or verse composition, resp. one telling a story, written for or as if for performance by actors, puppets or animated

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: True﻿ Story ;)
This man does﻿ not live, by cancer - A Jews live
every young woman's dream... Love﻿ you both
que hare viendo﻿ esto puto kiss fm
im﻿ too
I wouldnt love to learn how to do﻿ that kind of dancing
I have watched this vidio over﻿ 100 x
I WANT A PATRICK SWAYZE DIRTY DANCER TAKE MY HAND OR LEAVE ME IN THE CORNER BABY CAUSE I WANNA DANCE LIKE﻿ CRAZY.
voor,jou,goedmaker,,als,je,accept﻿
RIP Patrick﻿ Swayze!!
the black eyed peas﻿ need to die in a hole
I bought﻿ the dvd of this movie just to always have this to see and watch any time Patric RIP amd MS. Gray is still a sweet thimg BG
17﻿ people were made fun of practicing this at home and got caught by their best friend *Trailer Park Boys*
the﻿ personal train of patrick swayze
film﻿ culte j'adore
Chuck Norris puts baby﻿ in the corner...
LUCKY GIRL﻿ D:<
Holy shit its that guy from﻿ Trailer Park Boys
now that im done here,﻿ gonna watch the rest of crazy, stupid, love
I love to see Patrick Swayze dance...he can get down and dirty!!!﻿
RIP Swayze.... you are the best actor of﻿ all time!!
Oh,﻿ my Patrick, I miss you :(
Timmmmmeeeee﻿ e offfff my lifeeeeeeeeeeeeee
they dance﻿ on 5
LOOOOL xD Same﻿ here xD
